meanings.definition: A sweet yeast cake containing raisins, baked in a tall cylindrical mold.
meanings.sent1: I baked a delicious babka for the family gathering.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells the best babka in town.
meanings.sent3: The babka looked so good that it almost seemed too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly baked babka filled the entire kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the babka glistened under the kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a grandmother.
meanings.sent1: My babka always tells the best stories from her childhood.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my babka; she is so caring and wise.
meanings.sent3: When my babka starts dancing to her favorite song, it's always a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: My babka's love is a warm embrace that makes everything better.
meanings.sent5: The wisdom in my babka's eyes shines brighter than any star in the sky.
